participant_1.background:
My social media presence is part of my job, so I try to keep it up-to-date and interesting.
I enjoy my family and do not care about socializing.
last month the farm was foreclosed so i m looking for a new job.
I'm moving to a new city to be closer to my favorite antique stores and 80s music venues.
i like to bake brownies.

i do yoga three times a week.
i am picky when it comes to food.

content.text: Hi, how are you doing today?
I'm doing well, how about you?
I'm doing well, thank you! I'm just getting ready to move to a new city.
Oh, that's exciting! What city are you moving to?
I'm moving to Portland, Oregon. I'm really excited to be closer to my favorite antique stores and 80s music venues.
That sounds like a great place to live! I've never been to Portland, but I've heard good things about it.
It is a great place! I'm really looking forward to it.
I'm sure you'll love it there.
Thanks! I think I will too.
So, what do you do for a living?
I'm a social media manager for a small business.
Oh, that sounds like a fun job!
It is, I really enjoy it.
Do you have any hobbies?
I like to bake brownies, and I also like to play video games.
I'm not much of a baker, but I do enjoy video games.
What kind of video games do you like to play?
I like to play action-adventure games and RPGs.
I like those types of games too.
I'm sure we'll get along great
